name: kijiji
prompt_template:
Extract ALL apartment rental listings visible on this page. Get exactly {max_results} listings. For EACH listing shown, extract:
- listing_headline: the full title or headline of the rental listing
- rental_price: the monthly rent amount in dollars (include ranges if shown)
- listing_location: the address or location shown (street, neighborhood, or general area)
- bedrooms: number of bedrooms (Studio, 1, 2, 3, or ranges)
- full_details: complete description with all amenities, utilities, features mentioned
- listing_page_url: the full URL link to view this listing

Scrape ALL {max_results} visible listings with complete information.
